sourceProperties.ExceptionInstructions: Add the security mark "allow_non_org_iam_member" to the asset with a value of "true" to prevent this finding from being activated again.
sourceProperties.Recommendation: Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/iam?project=test-project and remove entries for users which are not in your organization (e.g. gmail.com addresses).
sourceProperties.Explanation: A user outside of your organization has IAM permissions on a project or organization.
